title: Wall Street Breakfast September 8: Fed's Michael Barr Maps Out His Priorities To Make Financial System Safer, Fairer
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Fed's Michael Barr maps out his priorities to make the financial system safer, fairer. Apple shows off updates to iPhone, AirPods, Apple Watch lines, including extreme sports version. Go big or go home? The ECB might find itself in a Catch-22. Stock futures cautious with global rates in focus ahead of ECB, Powell. Catch today’s WSB article seekingalpha.com/wsb. Invest Successfully With Alpha Picks https://seekingalpha.com/alpha-picks/subscribe.
